column2: "...Haa. Just now, I'm not sure why I got so irritated."
"I guess, that's how it seemed. Uuu... that's not good huh. I'm a failure as an ARKS, huh...?"
"...Thanks. I feel much better after you said that, fufu."
"How should I put it... \"I really felt that that was... disgusting\", or something."
"This planet's Miko is adulated, probably to the point where she's made to do what she doesn't want to."
"Isn't that unreasonable, when I thought that... somehow I kind of lost it..."
"...Haha, I, not even a Miko or anything, am this selfish. Stay calm, relax."
"Yep, self reflection done. Let's go find Kotoshiro."
"It's not just the Kuronians. The Darkers appeared too. We have to go help him."
